textBeforeTable: The desk above contains the following commands. Each command provides users with different access types. Refer to the Access Level Key for more information. Desk: PP/REC Central Processing Area: CENTRAL SERVICES - 8620CRD S: Update where higher access level is required. U: Update/approve and view access. V: View access only.
